alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Sanilac; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 3:46AM EST until February 18 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flash or near-flash freeze this morning, with snow expected this evening. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Lapeer, Sanilac, Shiawassee and Genesee Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Advisory start time now 4AM due to the potential for a flash or near-flash freeze this morning. A cold front crosses the area early this morning drawing significantly colder air south. Temperatures fall into the upper 20s by 10AM. Rain that fell overnight will not have time to dry before it begins freezing on area roadways this morning leading to very slick conditions. Snow still expected to defvelop early this evening and continuing into early tonight. Some blowing and drifting of snow will occur tonight with northerly winds gusting up around 20 mph.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
